queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[19].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[19].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[21].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[21].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[18].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[18].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[20].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[20].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.rules[3].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.rules[3].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[17].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[17].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[23].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[23].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[22].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[22].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[24].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[24].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[16].verbs should list the minimal set of needed objects or actions
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[16].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{networking}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{networking}}.resources.limits.memory is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{discovery}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{discovery}}.resources.limits.memory is undefined

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[2] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[2] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, list, watch) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{discovery}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{discovery}}.readinessProbe is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{networking}}.readinessProbe should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{networking}}.readinessProbe is undefined

queries.description: Containers should be configured with a secure Seccomp profile to restrict potentially dangerous syscalls

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{networking}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{networking}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{discovery}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{discovery}}.securityContext.seccompProfile.type is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken should be defined and set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.automountServiceAccountToken is undefined

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles when binded, should not use get, list or watch as verbs

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{discovery}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{discovery}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{networking}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{networking}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{networking}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["*"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{networking}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["*"]]

files.expected_value: The metadata.name={{networking}}.rules.verbs should not contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]
files.actual_value: The metadata.name={{networking}}.rules.verbs contain the following verbs: [["get", "list", "watch"]]

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=networking has limits defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=networking doesn't have limits defined

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=discovery has limits defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=discovery doesn't have limits defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{discovery}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{discovery}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{networking}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{networking}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{networking}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{networking}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{discovery}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{discovery}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{networking}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{networking}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.ports.port={{9091}} has a Pod port
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{discovery}}.spec.ports.port={{9091}} does not have a Pod port
